H0.text: What is the name of the assembly of cardinals for the election of a pope. Papal Council

H1.text: What is the name of the assembly of cardinals for the election of a pope. Cardinal Synod

H2.text: What is the name of the assembly of cardinals for the election of a pope. Vatican Assembly

H3.text: What is the name of the assembly of cardinals for the election of a pope. Conclave

A4.text: A conclave is a gathering of the College of Cardinals convened to appoint the pope of the Catholic Church.

A5.text: Proposed reforms include a plan to replace the College of Cardinals as the electoral body with the Synod of Bishops, which includes many more members.
